zh.name: 徐咏智哈哈哈
zh.hero_titles: 研发制造总监 | 供应链技术总监 | 智能制造设备工艺专家
zh.profile_desc: 16年高精智能制造专家，深耕3C消费电子（苹果核心供应链）与半导体后道封装领域。兼具消费类产品NPI全流程管控、DFM/MFD工艺优化、智能工厂规划落地及跨国跨职能团队管理经验。
zh.profile_c1_desc: 主导50+条高精密自动化产线NPI量产导入，推动2个智能工厂从0到1筹建。
zh.profile_c2_desc: 通过DFM优化、模块化设计与精益生产，实现OEE提升至85%+、产能提升90%+、良率稳定99.6%+。
zh.profile_c3_desc: 擅长协同研发与供应商团队突破制造瓶颈，确保设计与制造无缝衔接。
zh.skill_t1_1: 3C / 半导体精密工艺（激光切割、PVD、HAF贴合等）
zh.skill_t1_2: 智能产线全流程架构设计
zh.skill_t1_3: 设备定位精度1-2μm、运动系统20g+加速度
zh.skill_t1_5: 热学组件装配工艺优化、散热结构DFM分析
zh.skill_t1_6: 系统装配公差分析（GD&T深化应用）
zh.skill_t2_2: 自动化产线规划与量产导入
zh.skill_t2_3: 闭环数据管理系统搭建
zh.skill_t2_4: OEE / 良率 / 成本优化
zh.skill_t2_5: KISS原则落地（简化设计与制造流程）
zh.skill_t2_6: SPC数据驱动的良率与成本优化
zh.skill_t3_1: 跨国跨职能团队管理（中/新/德）
zh.skill_t3_2: 敏捷开发 + Stage-Gate流程推行
zh.skill_t3_3: 供应商标准化开发体系构建
zh.skill_t3_4: 精益生产（单线流/模块化）落地
zh.skill_t3_5: 跨文化协同研发与供应商协作
zh.skill_t3_6: 组建并领导7+人跨职能团队
zh.exp_1_role: 制造设计工程师 / 供应链技术负责人
zh.exp_1_p1_title: 阶段一：手机 / 手表制造（2019 - 至今）
zh.exp_1_p1_1: 主导行业首个光固化低压注塑成型自动化产线开发，遵循KISS原则采用模块化+单线流简化设计，减少冗余工站，设备成本、占地面积及治具用量下降80%+，成功量产导入。
zh.exp_1_p1_2: 牵头框架组装标准化产线研发，集成贴膜、点胶等工艺，实现50μm内组装精度，CT提升76%、产能提升90%，自动化率90%+，良率稳定99.6%+。
zh.exp_1_p1_3: 主导光固化模块设计，通过光学结构优化与散热冷却系统精准匹配，实现光强均匀性与热能平衡控制，保障高效固化效果。
zh.exp_1_p1_4: 搭建基于SPC逻辑的闭环数据系统，推动设备预测性维护，产能爬坡周期从3-4周缩短至4天，良率从95%提升至99.6%。
zh.exp_1_p2_title: 阶段二：脆性材料精密工艺与自动化开发（2017 - 2019）
zh.exp_1_p2_1: 创新研发蓝宝石带油墨镀膜激光切割工艺，通过独特光学结构和工艺流程实现激光成丝切割，精准控制受热断裂油墨区域≤0.1mm；主导搭建全自动化产线，人力节省80%+。
zh.exp_1_p2_2: 主导2个工厂超百条玻璃盖板产线自动化升级，创新20余种设备，人力节省10%+，生产一致性显著提升。
zh.exp_1_p2_3: 攻克蓝宝石组装工艺缺陷与产能瓶颈，通过优化热传递结构设计及工艺参数迭代，产能提升20%+，良率稳定至99%以上。
zh.exp_2_1: 主导道路探伤机器人初代底盘和探伤模块开发，完成上路测试验证，奠定系列化产品技术基础。
zh.exp_2_2: 负责集装箱爬壁、道路修补、探雷机器人等复杂系统设计，推动多项核心技术专利申请。
zh.exp_2_3: 通过技术展示与客户洽谈，成功获取多个项目立项，实现技术到商业的转化。
zh.exp_3_role: 机械工程师 / 研发经理
zh.exp_3_p1_title: 阶段一：独立研发项目组（成都，2014 - 2017）
zh.exp_3_p1_1: 组建并领导7+人跨职能团队，推行敏捷开发+Stage-Gate流程，关键节点交付率100%。
zh.exp_3_p1_2: 支援德/新团队完成SIPLACE E/TX贴片机核心组件开发，实现30μm定位精度、4g加速度性能突破。
zh.exp_3_p1_3: 协作开发TCB/Laser Dicing设备对位系统，达成2μm超高对位精度。
zh.exp_3_p2_title: 阶段二：新加坡研发中心（2011 - 2014）
zh.exp_3_p2_1: 负责SMT锡膏检测设备机械设计，主导机架及流水线开发，协作完成15μm精度龙门对位系统和光学系统设计。
zh.exp_3_p2_2: 主导半导体焊线机自动化光学检测设备开发，为马来西亚客户定制交付。
zh.exp_3_p2_3: 协作开发SMT锡膏印刷设备，实现15μm级高精度对位；主导半导体封装微型晶圆曝光设备开发，达成1μm超精密对位。
zh.exp_3_p3_1: 负责CO₂/光纤激光器整机系统设计，攻克热学结构与精密光学装配难点，实现微米级激光打标工艺。
zh.exp_3_p3_2: 协作开发40吨/80吨封装注塑压力机，负责底盘结构与铰链设计。
zh.exp_3_p3_3: 引入自上而下的结构设计与参数化方法，实现多产品系列设计标准化，提升开发效率。
zh.exp_4_1: 负责定制化特种切削刀具设计，独立完成零件图、装配图及工艺图纸全流程绘制。
zh.exp_4_2: 参与从客户需求沟通到生产交付的全流程管理，开发新生产工艺与工装夹具，提升生产效率。
zh.exp_4_3: 掌握产品研发至交付的全生命周期管理流程，奠定精密制造领域基础。
zh.edu_degree: 机械设计制造及其自动化 | 学士
zh.hobby_desc: 爱好动手实践，持续将DIY创新思维融入精密制造工艺优化。
zh.contact_obj_1: 研发制造总监 | 供应链技术总监
zh.contact_obj_2: 智能制造设备工艺专家 | 消费电子 NPI 负责人
zh.footer_desc: 高精智能制造专家 | 16年行业经验

en.name: Xu Yongzhi哈哈哈
en.hero_titles: R&D Manufacturing Director | Supply Chain Technical Director | Smart Manufacturing Expert
en.profile_desc: 16-year expert in high-precision smart manufacturing, specializing in 3C consumer electronics (Apple Core Supply Chain) and semiconductor backend packaging. Extensive experience in NPI lifecycle management, DFM/MFD process optimization, smart factory planning, and leading cross-functional international teams.
en.profile_c1_desc: Led NPI and mass production for 50+ high-precision automated lines; spearheaded the 0-to-1 establishment of two smart factories.
en.profile_c2_desc: Optimized OEE to >85%, increased capacity by 90%, and stabilized yield at 99.6% through DFM, modular design, and Lean manufacturing.
en.profile_c3_desc: Expert in bridging R&D and supplier teams to resolve manufacturing bottlenecks, ensuring seamless design-to-manufacturing transition.
en.skill_t1_1: 3C / Semi Precision Process (Laser Cutting, PVD, HAF Lamination)
en.skill_t1_3: High Precision (1-2μm) & High Speed (20g+) Motion Systems
en.skill_t1_5: Thermal Assembly Optimization & Heat Dissipation DFM
en.exp_1_role: Manufacturing Design Engineer / Supply Chain Tech Lead
en.exp_1_p1_title: Phase I: iPhone / Apple Watch Mfg (2019 - Present)
en.exp_1_p1_1: Led the industry's first UV low-pressure molding automation line. Applied KISS principle with modular & one-piece flow design, reducing redundancy. Cut equipment cost/footprint by 80%+.
en.exp_1_p1_2: Spearheaded frame assembly standardization (lamination/dispensing), achieving <50μm accuracy. Increased CT by 76%, capacity by 90%, automation >90%, and yield to 99.6%.
en.exp_1_p1_3: Led UV curing module design, optimizing optical structure and cooling systems to ensure uniform intensity and thermal balance.
en.exp_1_p1_4: Built an SPC-based closed-loop data system for predictive maintenance, shortening ramp-up from 3-4 weeks to 4 days and boosting yield from 95% to 99.6%.
en.exp_1_p2_title: Phase II: Brittle Material Precision Process (2017 - 2019)
en.exp_1_p2_1: Innovated sapphire laser cutting process with ink coating. Achieved filament cutting with <0.1mm heat-affected zone. Automated line reduced labor by 80%.
en.exp_1_p2_2: Led automation upgrades for 100+ glass cover lines across 2 factories, innovating 20+ equipment types and improving consistency while cutting labor by 10%.
en.exp_1_p2_3: Resolved sapphire assembly defects and bottlenecks. Optimized thermal transfer structure and process parameters, boosting capacity by 20% and yield to >99%.
en.exp_2_1: Led development of road inspection robot chassis and detection modules, completing road tests and establishing the technical foundation for the product series.
en.exp_2_2: Designed complex systems including container wall-climbing, road repair, and mine-detection robots. Drove key patent applications.
en.exp_2_3: Successfully secured multiple project initiations through technical demonstrations and client negotiations, converting technology into business value.
en.exp_3_p1_1: Built and led a 7+ member cross-functional team, implementing Agile + Stage-Gate processes with 100% key milestone delivery rate.
en.exp_3_p1_2: Supported German/Singapore teams on SIPLACE E/TX core component development, achieving 30μm accuracy and 4g acceleration.
en.exp_3_p1_3: Collaborated on TCB/Laser Dicing equipment alignment systems, achieving 2μm ultra-high precision.
en.exp_3_p2_1: Responsible for SMT SPI equipment mechanical design (frame & conveyor) and collaborated on 15μm gantry alignment and optical systems.
en.exp_3_p2_2: Led development of automated optical inspection for semiconductor wire bonders, delivering customized solutions for Malaysian clients.
en.exp_3_p2_3: Collaborated on SMT printing equipment (15μm alignment) and led micro-wafer exposure equipment development (1μm precision).
en.exp_3_p3_1: Designed CO₂/Fiber laser marking systems, resolving thermal structure and precision optical assembly challenges for micron-level marking.
en.exp_3_p3_2: Collaborated on 40T/80T encapsulation molding press development (chassis & toggle design).
en.exp_3_p3_3: Introduced top-down design and parametric methods, standardizing product series design and improving efficiency.
en.exp_4_1: Designed customized special cutting tools, drafting full sets of part, assembly, and process drawings.
en.exp_4_2: Managed full lifecycle from client communication to delivery, developing new processes and fixtures to improve efficiency.
en.exp_4_3: Mastered the full R&D-to-delivery lifecycle, laying the foundation for precision manufacturing.
en.edu_school: Southwest University of Science and Technology
en.hobby_desc: Passionate about hands-on practice, continuously integrating DIY innovative thinking into precision manufacturing process optimization.
en.contact_obj_1: R&D Manufacturing Director | Supply Chain Technical Director
en.contact_obj_2: Smart Mfg Equipment Expert | Consumer Electronics NPI Lead
en.footer_desc: High-Precision Smart Manufacturing Expert | 16 Years Exp.
